definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: So, the Wuchang Guo Jia access and nine gun eight to three tribes.
sentences.chinese: 於是，那五常和九槍八等去三部落的郭家接人。

sentences.english: And a car had been ordered to meet the train?
sentences.chinese: 已經派車去車站接人了嗎？

sentences.english: I consider this spamming and won't pick someone who spams for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是垃圾郵件，也不會接人誰就業垃圾。

definition: jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)

to take the car, bus, train etc
to get off a plane/to deplane
